page.title: 11KENNICOTT SCHOOL
page.content: Kennicott is a 6th form school,it is part of Kevics (King Edward the 6th college).It is just down the road from the college so they dont have to walk far,It was built by the Singer family that now are Singer sewing machines,but four years ago it was a boarding school for boys.Where Kevics is now was the Singer family's garden.Kennicott is just for 6th formers and the privilege of being there is you dont have to wear school uniform.The rest of the school is divided into two sites,lower & main school,separated by a main road.Lower school is for age 11 & main school 12 to 16s.
